references.reason: This paper is foundational for diffusion models and provides the theoretical basis for many of the methods used in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat GANs on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the practical effectiveness of diffusion models for image generation, providing empirical evidence that significantly impacted the field.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduced the use of stochastic differential equations (SDEs) for training diffusion models, providing a more principled and flexible approach.

references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper is a foundational work connecting denoising score matching to diffusion processes, providing an early theoretical framework for diffusion models.
This paper provides a theoretical framework connecting generative flow networks (GFlowNets) to diffusion models and proposes a new training objective that is crucial to the target paper.
